xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 29 July 2013
xwikidoc.content: <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 06:52 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 08:53 <bvancea> hey sdumitriu 09:12 <sdumitriu> Hey bvancea 09:12 <bvancea> how are you? 09:13 <bvancea> should we send more detailed status updates today instead of the normal ones? 09:13 <bvancea> since the midterm evaluation period officially started 09:13 <bvancea> I think 09:14 <bvancea> I find it hard to keep track of UTC aswell 09:14 <sdumitriu> Yes 09:14 <sdumitriu> Or you could send a weekly update and a midterm summary 09:14 <bvancea> hmm 09:15 <bvancea> sounds good 09:15 <sdumitriu> With the progress so far, what went well, what could have gone better, what's left to do 09:15 <bvancea> I see 09:15 <bvancea> okay :) 09:15 <bvancea> btw, the coding does not actually stop, does it? 09:16 <bvancea> until the 2nd of August 09:41 <sdumitriu> No 09:41 <bvancea> okay 09:42 <bvancea> cool :D 09:43 <bvancea> should I start a doodle poll for the hangout this week? 11:24 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 11:59 <bvancea> sdumitriu: do you have any experience with jide? 11:59 <bvancea> I'm getting a weird error: The Lm class is invalid, exiting... 11:59 <bvancea> google says it's related to jide 12:02 <sdumitriu1> No 12:02 <sdumitriu1> What's the full stacktrace? 12:02 <bvancea> there is no stacktrace 12:03 <bvancea> the client closes without exception, just prints the message: The Lm class is invalid, exiting... 15:04 <sdumitriu1> bvancea: Wednesday afternoon next hangout? 15:04 <sdumitriu1> Marc is busy Thursday 15:04 <bvancea> sounds good 15:04 <sdumitriu1> K 15:25 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 15:35 <sdumitriu1> mcupak: Next hangout is Wednesday afternoon, are you available? 15:37 <mcupak> sdumitriu1: yeah, that's fine 15:39 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 15:44 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 17:38 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant
